import React, { useState } from "react"; function Form() { const [company, setCompany] = useState(); const [country, setCountry] = useState(); const [city, setCity] = useState(); const [salary, setSalary] = useState(); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); axios .post("http://localhost:3000/form", { company, country, city, salary }) .then((result) => { console.log(result); navigate("/home"); }) .catch((error) => console.error(error)); }; return (

); } export default Form;
